title: Can anyone identify this script font?
content:
Hey everyone...  
Does anyone know what script font this is?  
My thanks ahead... I'm trying to locate it.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829065731im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sea_4355.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sea.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829065731/http:/typophile.com/files/sea.jpg) | 49.15 KB |
author: flashflood

comments.content: It's Lys Calligraphic. I don't know of a digital version, but I have one in preparation...

Thanks Nick... I appreciate the insight and look forward to seeing your version.  
Based on a few places that I've seen this in the past, I assume there must be a digital version that already exists - Does anyone know of one?
Can you give us some insight into where this sample came from? Websites are especially helpful given the nature of PDF and Shockwave files.
